tool_description: Vacation Rental Management and Short Term Rental Tools. Get Airbnb Reviews, Airbnb Ratings, VRBO Reviews

api_list.name: Get VRBO Listing Reviews

Returns up to the last 10 reviews on a listing from VRBO
